title: Descendants
description: In this powerful debut novel sponsored by BookRix, newly discovered talent, author R. Lynn, reveals the threatening struggle of a young girl who discovers what she was raised to believe isn't real, and that the future of life depends on her decisions.The first book in a breakthrough series, The Descendants tells of an epic struggle between the surface world and those who long ago were banished to the Deep Kingdom. It's also the story of characters Sollara and Kai as they gradually realize the full extent of their elemental powers even as others seek to keep them from this knowledge. Dark magic and villains with an insatiable need for the blood of their victims are at the heart of this riveting tale.
author: R. Lynn
